thread.title: BRIEF-Bossini International Holdings Posts‍ HY Loss Attributable To Owners Of Co HK$11.8 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bossini International Holdings Posts‍ HY Loss Attributable To Owners Of Co HK$11.8 Million

organizations.name: brief-bossini international holdings posts‍ hy loss attributable to owners of co

text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Bossini International Holdings Ltd :
* ‍ HY REVENUE HK$974.1 MILLION VERSUS HK$1.02 BILLION * ‍ DECLARED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF HK1.22 CENTS PER ORDINARY SHARE​
* HY LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE TO OWNERS OF CO HK$11.8 MILLION VERSUS PROFIT OF HK$16.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
